He is taking out another loan of 10,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to purchase clothing materials for making trousers, and to buy khangas to stock in his store for sale. He hopes to improve his living standards using the loans.

loans.use: to purchase clothing materials for making trousers and to buy khangas to stock in his store for sale.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong, 48, is married and has two children: one son and one daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a bricklayer. She earns an income running a general store in front of her house. 

She started this business thirty years ago. She sells sugar, toys for kids, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, in particular foods and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of products, in particular foods and beverages, to stock her store.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 45 years old, married to Monicah, and blessed with four children aged 19, 17, 13 and 10 years. He supplies sand and bricks, a business he started three years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 15,000. 

He has requested a first loan of KES 30,000 to purchase bricks and sand for sale. Profit made will aid him to educate his children. His dream is to one day purchase a motor bike and bicycle spare parts for sale.

The profit he earns from his business will aid him to repay his loan. He hopes to succeed in his business and in life.

loans.use: To purchase bricks and sand for sale.

loans.name: Thu

texts.en:
Thu is 49 years old and  has two sons. Her husband is a bricklayer. She has been running a business of selling second-hand clothes in a market for 20 years. She started this business to cover her expenses and raise her two children. She and her family live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Thu is requesting a loan to buy more clothing in order to expand the size of her business and help her to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the rent on her agricultural land.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 23 years old. She is married to Thomas and they have one child aged two years.

She has been in the retail shop business for two years and currently earns a monthly income of KES 8,000. The loan will be used to buy stock of sugar, flour and washing detergents. The anticipated profits will be used to buy additional stock for the retail shop.


This is Vivian's first loan term with KADET LTD. Her hopes and dreams are to have a happy family and a successful business.

loans.use: to buy  sugar, flour and  washing detergents for sale.

loans.name: Afia

texts.en:
Afia sells fish and soap at Mbeam near Abura. Afia has received education through Junior Secondary School. She is married and has seven children. Her husband is a teacher.

 Afia has been selling soap and fish for 6 years. She is responsible for caring for her children and paying other household expenses. Her loan will be used to purchase fish and soap in bulk. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to continue to expand her business and care for her family.

loans.use: To purchase soap and fish in bulk

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh is 29 years old.  She is married and her husband is a driver for hire.  She has two children and lives with them and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City.

She has run a general store from her home for two years.  She sells milk, beverages, stationery and confectionery.  She intends to use her loan to buy a variety of milk products to sell from her store.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a variety of milk products to sell.

loans.name: Ha

texts.en:
Ha is 43 years old and married with two children, one son and one daughter. Ha lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income as a bricklayer. Ha supports her family by sewing clothes and other products at her house. She started her business twenty years ago. 

Ha intends to take out a loan to buy more materials to increase her production of clothes. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more materials to increase her production of clothes

loans.name: Ngo

texts.en:
Ngo, 47, is married and has two sons. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works as a security guard.

Ngo has been running a beauty shop in front of her house for twenty-four years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater quantity of different haircare and cosmetic products to better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her children to school.

loans.use: To buy haircare and cosmetic products to better satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
Basilia tiene 46 años, su pareja es Juan, con quien tiene siente hijos, pero ahora sólo viven con cinco de ellos, ya que los otros dos son independientes.
Ella se dedica a la agricultura desde los 23 años. Ahora, con la ayuda de su esposo, siembra papas, arvejas, maíz y flores. Todos los días vigila con paciencia sus campos, hasta la espera de la cosecha, mientras tanto cuida a sus animales, tiene vacas, toros, ovejas y cerdos. La cosecha es otra actividad muy cansada, por eso tiene que contratar personas para agilizar este trabajo. Ella es una mujer que no se cansa fácilmente, porque aparte de criar animales, vende comida en la feria de su distrito. Y como es una mujer emprendedora, para el futuro, tiene planeado sembrar en mayor cantidad para mejorar sus ganancias, especialmente arvejas, ya que la demanda se mantiene en cada mes del año. 

Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de Cumutay” y este sería su préstamo número 11 con MFP, donde promete que será muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, además está contenta con el trabajo en su banco comunal por los ahorros en equipo.
Con este dinero, Basilia comprará dos bolsas de semillas de arvejas (con 1200 soles), lo restante le servirá para adquirir bolsas de fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Basilia is 46 years old. Her partner is Juan, with whom she has seven children. But now only five live with them, as the other two are independent. 

She has been farming for 23 years. Now, with her husband's help she grows potatoes, peas, corn and flowers. Every day she watches over her fields patiently, waiting for the harvest. Meanwhile she looks after her animals. She has cows, bulls, sheep and pigs. 

The harvest is another very tiring activity. That is why she has to hire people in order to speed up this job. She is a woman who doesn't tire easily, because apart from raising animals she sells food in the local market. And as she is an enterprising woman, in the future she intends to plant in greater quantity in order to improve her earnings; especially peas, as there keeps being demand in each month of the year. 

She belongs to the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay” communal bank. This will be her 11th loan with MFP, where she promises to be very punctual in paying her installments. In addition, she is happy working with her communal bank because of the savings they do as a team. 

With this money, Basilia will buy two bags of pea seeds with 1200 soles and the remainder will be used to acquire sacks of fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy pea seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Binh

texts.en:
Binh is 54 years old.  She is married and has three children.  Her husband earns an income as a driver for hire.  She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Binh started operating a general store 10 years ago.  She sells household items and beverages.  She is requesting a loan in order to expand her business by buying a greater variety of basic products to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to enable her to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of basic products to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
Dionicia tiene 28 años, está casada con Reynaldo, con quien tiene dos hijos a los que quiere mucho. La casa donde viven la alquilan desde hace 10 años.
Ella trabaja en pequeños proyectos del gobierno, por ese motivo comenzó con el negocio de compra y venta de animales hace poco tiempo. Durante este tiempo se encuentra obteniendo grandes resultados, pues existen muy pocas personas en su zona que se dedican a ese negocio; “existen ganaderos en otras poblaciones lejanas, por ello cada semana vendo animales, pues vivo en la ciudad y tengo mayor accesibilidad en la feria”, comenta. Su ganado lo comercializa en la feria que se desarrolla en la localidad de Pampas, los días domingos, ahí cada semana obtiene ganancias y por esa razón Dionicia quiere aumentar su capital de trabajo para abastecer a sus clientes.  

Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Los puntualitos” y este es su quinto crédito con MFP. En todo este tiempo obtuvo el dinero necesario para invertir en el desarrollo de su negocio, por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada pertenecer a su asociación donde todas las personas son responsables.
Dionicia invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de 20 ovejas, pues en esta temporada los animales tienen menor precio.
texts.en:
Dionicia is 28. She is married to Reynaldo and they have two children, whom she loves very much. They live in a house which they have rented for 10 years. 

Dionicia works on small government projects and she started a business buying and selling animals a short while ago. So far she has been very successful – there are very few people in her area who work in this domain. “There are livestock farmers in other areas, further away, which is why I sell animals every week. It’s because I live in the town and have better access to the market”, she says. She sells her livestock at the market that is held in the town of Pampas on Sundays. She makes an income there every week and would like to boost her working capital so that she can increase her supply to customers.  

Dionicia belongs to the community bank “Los puntualitos” and this will be her fifth loan with MFP. During this time she has received the money that she needed in order to invest in the development of her business. She has pledged to be punctual in repaying the loan. In addition, she is very pleased to be a member of the bank, whose participants are all responsible people.

Dionicia will invest this loan in the purchase of 20 sheep, because this is the season when animals are at their cheapest.

loans.use: to buy 20 sheep.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es:
Delfina tiene 30 años, está casada con Emilio, tienen un hijo. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en una zona agrícola. 
Ella es una mujer de coraje, cada mañana se dirige al campo para cuidar de sus cultivos de papas, arvejas y maíz. Una de sus más grandes satisfacciones es ver el resultado cuando negocia sus productos en la ciudad. Para agilizar el trabajo contrata operarios a quienes paga cada día, por labrar, cosechar y cargar los pesados sacos. Las ganancias que obtiene de la venta de sus productos son buenos, por eso quiere ampliar sus cultivos y obtener más ingresos, así estaría asegurárnosles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Delfina está planeando iniciar una siembra de arvejas este mes.

Este es su crédito número 11 con MFP y está muy agradecida por la confianza de tantos años de trabajo en esta institución. Además es una socia puntual y responsable dentro de su banco comunal “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay”.
Ahora se inicia la temporada fuerte para la siembra de arveja, por ello invertirá todo el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de cinco bolsas de semillas (con 2700 soles); con lo restante adquirirá fertilizantes.
texts.en:
Delfina, age 30, is married to Emilio, and they have one child.  They live in their own house in an agricultural area.  She is a courageous woman.  Every morning she heads to the field to take care of her potato, pea, and corn crops.  One of the things that she finds most satisfying is seeing the result when she negotiates the sale of her products in the city.

In order to speed up the work she hires day workers.  She pays them every day to work, harvest, and to load the heavy sacks.  The earnings that she gets from the sale of her products are good.  Therefore, she wants to increase her crops and get more income.  She would be assuring her family of a better quality of life.  Delfina plans to start planting peas this month.

This is her 11th loan with MFP.  She is very grateful for the trust placed in her for so many years of working with this institution.  She is a punctual member, and she is responsible in her communal bank, “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay”.

The high season for planting peas starts now.  She will use all of the money from this loan to buy five bags of seeds (with 2,700 soles).  She will buy fertilizers with whatever is left over.

loans.use: to buy five bags of seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson does electronic repairs to earn a living. He previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya which helped him to buy spare parts for televisions and radios. This helped him to improve his business and with the income he generated, he was able to support his family. Johnson is requesting a loan of 30,000 KES to buy more spare parts for televisions and radios.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for television and radios.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es:
Celestino tiene 50 años, está casado con Dominga, con quien tiene dos hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia, la que Celestino construyó con mucho esfuerzo.
Él se dedica a la agricultura desde los 18 años.  En la actualidad siembra papa, arvejas, maíz y flores. Le gusta mucho la labor de campo porque la realiza con todos los miembros de su familia. Reconoce que la labor es sacrificada, pues debe vigilar todos sus cultivos para que no se pierdan por las plagas o el mal clima, de esta manera siente que su dedicación es recompensada durante el tiempo de cosecha, pues recoge toda su producción y la vende en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad. También se dedica a la crianza de abejas, actividad que considera como un pasatiempo, pero de la que obtiene ingresos extras por la venta de la miel. Ahora piensa sembrar arvejas, ya que se acercan los días de lluvia y tiene que aprovechar esa temporada.

Él pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de Cumutay” y este sería su crédito número 11 con MFP, por lo que está muy agradecido con todas las personas que hacen posible este crédito. 
Celestino invertirá, esta vez, en la compra de tres bolsas de semillas de arvejas.
texts.en:
Celestino is 50 years old. He is married to Dominga, with whom he has two children. They live in their own house that Celestino built with a great deal of effort.

He has been farming since he was 18 years old. Currently he grows potatoes, peas, corn and flowers. He really likes farm work, because he does it with all the members of his family. 

He acknowledges that the work involves sacrifice, but he must watch over all his crops so that they aren't lost because of pests or bad weather. This way he feels that his dedication is rewarded at harvest time, as he gathers his whole crop and sells it at the wholesale market in his city. 

He also raises bees, and activity he considers a hobby, but from which he obtains extra income through the sale of the honey. Now he intends to plant peas, as the rainy season is approaching and he has to make best use of the season.

He belongs to the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay” communal bank. This would be his 11th loan with MFP, so he is very grateful to all the people who are making this loan possible.  

This time, Celestino will invest in the purchase of three bags of pea seeds.

loans.use: To buy three bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Lien

texts.en:
Lien, 43, is married and has two children: one son and one daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn an income running store to selling coffee and soft drinks to people in their community. 

She started this business twenty-five years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of beverages and good quality coffee, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of beverages and good quality coffee, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en: Anna operates a grocery store to earn a living. She had previously acquired a loan of 50,000 KES from Faulu Kenya, which helped her to add stock. With the income that she generated, she was able to cater for her family needs. She is requesting another loan of 50,000 KES to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Thu

texts.en:
Thu is 54 years old, widowed and has four children, three sons and one daughter. She has been making clothes and other cloth products for thirty years. She started this business to cover her expenses and raise her family. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City.

Thu is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying better quality materials to make clothing. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy better quality materials to make clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 15 bags of fertilizers and to pay the day workers who clear the weeds from his crops.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong is a 32-year-old married woman. She lives with a daughter and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a security guard. For eight years, she has supported her family by making clothes and other products at her house.

Phuong would like a loan to purchase better quality materials to enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase better quality sewing materials

loans.name: Sau

texts.en:
Sau is 51 years old.  She is married and has three children, two sons and one daughter.  She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

For the past six years, she and her husband have been running a store and selling fishing equipment and related items to their customers.  Sau started this business in order to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her children. 

Sau is requesting a loan to enable her to expand her business by buying higher quality fishing equipment to better meet her customers’ demands.  She hopes that through this loan, she will be able to expand her business activities and generate enough income to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment to sell from her store

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan is 52 years old and is married. She has two children and lives with them in Ho Chi Minh City. 

She has run a food stall selling meals, soup, and noodles for 25 years. She intends to use her loan to buy many kinds of food to sell to her customers and attract more new customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and save money for family emergencies.

loans.use: To buy many kinds of food to sell to her customers and attract more new customers.

loans.name: Ba

texts.en:
Ba, 61, is widowed and has nine children, three sons and six daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Ba started a shop to sell coffee and beverages 14 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of beverages to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of beverages to sell at her store

loans.name: Gbotema Business Women Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you members of the "Gbotema Business Women" group. They are petty businesswomen from the city of Kenema, in Eastern Sierra Leone. They have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of 500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones for each in the group. With the help of this loan, each of them will be able to add more inventory to her respective business.

A business with a large inventory can naturally attract many customers and this will lead to more sales and better profit. In addition to this, the larger the inventory, the fewer business trips these women will make. So, profit will naturally increase, empowering them to better support their children in terms of feeding, clothing, education, etc. 

The featured member for this group is Messie. A native of Kenema city, Messie is 32 years old. She is married to a trader and she is a mother of 3 children - one in primary school and two in secondary school. Messie sells peppers and has been doing this business for many years now. With this loan, she is going to buy peppers in large quantity to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy peppers in large quantity to add to her current inventory

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 46 años, tiene tres hijos, pero ahora sólo vive con dos de ellos. 
Gracias a su esfuerzo logró criar y educar a sus hijos sola, y lo sigue haciendo. La agricultura es su actividad económica principal, la realiza desde hace 20 años. Empezó sembrando papas, arvejas y maíz y en todos estos años aprendió del clima y las enfermedades que atacan a sus cultivos, y ya sabe cómo enfrentarlos. En la libertad del campo, también se encarga de criar carneros, caballos, vacas y cerdos, los que vende después de engordarlos. Y a pesar de tener varias responsabilidades, dispone de tiempo para atender sus cultivos, sus animales y a su familia. 

Este es su crédito número 11 con MFP, da su palabra de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas. Por otro lado, se siente contenta de pertenecer al banco comunal “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay”.
Juana destinará 1200 soles en la compra de una bolsa de semillas de arvejas, con lo restante comprará abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Juana is 46 years old. She has three children, but now only lives with two of them. 

Thanks to her efforts, she managed to raise and educate her children on her own, and continues to do so. Farming is her main livelihood.  She has been doing it for 20 years. She began by growing potatoes, peas and corn. In all those years she learned about the climate, and the diseases that attack her crops, and now knows how to confront them. 

In the freedom of the countryside, she also takes on the responsibility of raising rams, horses, cows and pigs, that she sells after fattening them. And despite having several responsibilities, she has the time available to look after her crops, her animals and her family. 

This is her 11th loan with MFP, and she gives her word that she will make the installment payments on time. Moreover, she feels happy to belong to the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay,” communal bank. 

Juana will earmark 1200 soles for the purchase of a bag of pea seeds, and with the remainder she will buy organic fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy pea seeds and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 57 años, está casado con Dionicia, con quien tiene siete hijos, pero ahora sólo vive con el menor de ellos. Esta familia vive en su casa propia ubicada en un distrito agrícola.
Él se dedica a la agricultura desde los 20 años, por eso es un hombre diestro en las labores del campo. En  la actualidad siembra papas y arvejas, en sus terrenos propios. Es consciente que el trabajo es muy cansado, por eso cuando sus hijos mayores tienen tiempo lo apoyan con las siembras y cosechas; está orgulloso de  ellos. Él sabe como negociar sus productos, bien en la misma ciudad de su distrito o en otra ciudad aledaña, para ello traslada sus pesados sacos en camiones. “Los compradores llevan al por mayor, por eso las ventas son más fáciles cuando se tienen conocidos”, dice. Para el futuro tiene planeado ampliar sus cultivos, por lo que ahora sembrará más arvejas.

Él pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este sería su crédito número 11 con MFP. Está muy agradecido con todas las personas que hacen posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso, razón por lo que promete pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Manuel invertirá este dinero en la compra de dos bolsas de semillas de arvejas.
texts.en:
Manuel is 57 years old and is married to Dionicia.  They have seven children, but now only the youngest lives with them.  This family lives in a home of their own, located in an agricultural district.

He has been farming for 20 years, so he is an expert in field labor.  He currently raises potatoes and peas on his own land.  It happens that the work is very exhausting, so his children help with the planting and harvesting whenever they have time.  He is proud of them.  He knows how to sell his products well in his own town or in other nearby towns.  For this he transports his heavy sacks in trucks.  “The buyers buy in quantity, so it’s easier to make sales when you know people,” he says.  In the future he plans to expand his crops so he is planting more peas.

He is a member of the “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” communal bank and this will be his 11th loan through MFP.  He is very grateful to all those who make this loan possible, as it allows him to continue making progress.  For this reason he promises to make his payments on time.

Manuel will invest this money in two sacks of pea seeds.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of pea seeds.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia de sesenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y otros productos varios como hilos, ganchos para el cabello, pulseras entre otros, tiene varios años de trabajar en el mercado de la zona donde reside, posee experiencia en las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por sus excelentes ofertas, productos de calidad y  a precios accesibles, además de un buen servicio; Lidia es una mujer audaz, emprendedora, entregada a su labor, uno de sus mas grandes sueños es alcanzar el éxito pues solo así completara su felicidad, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar su negocio y mantenerse al frente de la competencia, pero no posee del suficiente capital para lograr la inversión en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos hilos, pulceras etc. Lidia posee excelentes referencias de sus conocidos, asegura ser responsable para cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez esforzarse para ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Lidia, who is sixty-five years old, lives together with her life partner and her son, in a house of her own. She sells cosmetic products and several other products, such as, thread, hairpins and bracelets, among others. She has been working in the market of the area where she lives for several years. She has experience in sales and she has built a big customer base that prefers her for her excellent offers, quality products and affordable prices, in addition to the good service she provides. Lidia is a brave, entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her work. One of her biggest dreams is to reach success, because only that will allow her to fulfill her happiness. Like every good sales person, she wants to expand her business and keep ahead of the competition, but she doesn't have enough capital to make the investment in supplies that she needs. This is why she is requesting INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy cosmetic products, thread, bracelets, etc. Lidia has excellent references from all the people she knows and she assures she is responsible and will repay the loan in the established period, while at the same time she making the effort to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products, thread and bracelets

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is a 34-year-old married woman with three children.  She lives in Tiribe, Kenya with her family.  For the past two years, Mwanamisi has been operating a green-grocery business.  She sells fruits and vegetables such as mangoes, tomatoes, onions, and cabbages to the people in her community and to passers-by.  This business allows her to generate the income that she needs.

Mwanamisi works hard to help her husband meet the needs of their family.  At present, she needs additional capital for her business.  She is requesting a loan of 30,000 KES in order to buy additional merchandise like tomatoes, potatoes, onions, mangoes, etc. to sell.  With the added merchandise, she will be able to cater to and attract more customers, thus increasing both her sales and income. 

In the future, Mwanamisi wants to expand her business to generate more income to better meet her family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise to sell, like tomatoes, potatoes, onions, mangoes, etc.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa is 51 years old.  She is married and has two children.  She and her husband support the family through the income they earn from selling soft drinks.  They have been in business for 18 years and they live in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Hoa intends to take a loan in order to increase her working capital and buy a wider variety of soft drinks.  The additional capital will enable her to increase her sales. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will enable her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her working capital and buy a wider variety of soft drinks.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda tiene 46 años, está separa del padre de su hijo, el cual ya es mayor y tiene su propia familia. Ahora Yolanda vive sola en la casa que construyó con el apoyo de su familia.
Hace 20 años su pareja la dejó, desde entonces se hizo cargo del cuidado y educación de su hijo a base de la producción de papas, arvejas, maíz y flores. “Todos los productos son rentables si se sabe cuidarlos bien y si se sabe vender”, afirma. Por ejemplo; menciona que en estos meses es favorable sembrar arvejas; en enero y febrero, papas; y en mayo y noviembre, las flores. Así aprovecha al máximo sus tierras para obtener el dinero necesario. También cría vacas, de las que obtiene leche, y produce miel de abeja, cuenta con un panal. De esta manera, Yolanda trabaja en la libertad del campo y contenta con sus logros. 

Este es su primer crédito con MFP y está agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan. Acaba de ingresar al banco comunal “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay”, como socia y promete que será responsable en los pagos y en las reuniones.
Invertirá los 1000 soles que ahora solicita en la compra de dos bolsas de semillas de arveja.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 46 years old. She is separated from the father of her son, who is now an adult and has his own family. Now Yolanda lives alone in the house that she built with her family's support. 

Her partner left her 20 years ago. Since then, she has taken responsibility for looking after and educating her son, by growing potatoes, peas, corn and flowers. “All the products are profitable if you know how to look after them properly and if you know how to sell them," she says. For example, she says that these months are favorable for planting peas; in January and February, potatoes; and in May and November, flowers. 

This way she will make the very best use of her land to earn the money she needs. She also raises cows, from which she obtains milk. She has a beehive and produces honey. In this way, Yolanda works in the freedom of the countryside, happy with her accomplishments. 

This is her first loan with MFP and she is grateful for the opportunity they are offering her. She has just become a member of the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay” communal bank, and promises she will be responsible with her payments and with the meetings. 

She will use the 1000 soles she is now applying for to purchase two bags of pea seeds.

loans.use: To buy two bags of pea seeds.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan con su anterior credikiva  compró materiales biológicos, cajas, láminas de cera y núcleos para producir la miel de abejas que comercializó como estaba previsto; así mismo invirtió en mercancía que su esposa vendió y cada uno logró aumentar su capital de trabajo. En la actualidad se prepara para recibir un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprara materiales para sus apiarios, pues desea continuar fortalecerlos. También repellará paredes en su vivienda, pues tiene como meta hacer de su hogar un lugar cada vez más confortable. Todo esto Juan lo agradece a Kiva y espera que  continúen apoyando al pequeño productor, para que logren mejorar sus ingresos, como lo han venido haciendo hasta hoy.
texts.en:
With his previous Kiva loan, Juan bought organic supplies, crates, combs, and cores to produce the honey which he sold. He also bought merchandise that he wife sold, and both of them increased their working capital.

He is about to receive a new Kiva loan to buy supplies for his apiaries because he wants to keep them strong. He will also replaster the walls of his house because his goal is to make it more comfortable. He is grateful to Kiva for all of this and hopes the lenders will continue to support small producers so that they can increase their incomes as he has been doing until now.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his apiaries and constuctions materials to replaster the walls of his house.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monica is 42 years old, and is married with three children. She operates a retail shop to earn a living. She has been in the business since 2004. 

Monica operates her business in a busy environment with reliable customers. In addition, she does dairy farming to supplement her income.

She previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya, which helped her to improve her business. Monica dreams of operating a wholesale business in the future. She has requested a loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to buy sugar, cooking oil, and cereals.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oil, and cereals.

loans.name: Cuc

texts.en:
Cuc is 64 years old, is single, and lives in Ho Chi Minh City. Cuc has been running a general store in front of her door for 19 years.

Cuc started this business to generate income and cover her expenses. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more household items and many kinds of soft drinks to stock her store. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business.

She hopes that with this loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more household items and many kinds of soft drinks to stock her store.

loans.name: Clemente

texts.es: El señor Clemente nacido en la comunidad de minas pampa de la provincia de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vive en su comunidad con su familia con su esposa y sus dos hijos menores, la descripción de su casa está construido de barro con techo de teja con revoques de barro la determinación es rustico prácticamente, la comunidad del cliente esta a 3 km al este de la localidad de Tiraque. La actividad económica es la agricultura que produce tubérculos y cereales, la producción es estacional en la zona son alturas del valle alto. El préstamo que está solicitando es para la compra de abono de gallina y un toro pequeño, el cliente tiene interés de superarse sus ingresos económicos en los próximos años, los trabajos agrícolas lo realizan toda la familia en algunos casos con ayuda de sus vecinos para la siembra y la cosecha los labores culturales trabajan la familia
texts.en:
Clemente, born in Minas Pampas in Tiraque province in the department of Cochabamba, now lives here with his family, wife, and two minor children. His mud house has a tile roof reinforced with mud and is very rustic. Clemente's community is 3 km east of Tiraque. He is a farmer. He grows tubers and grains, and production is seasonal in the high region of the valley.

He is requesting a loan to buy chicken manure and a small bull.  He wants to increase his income in the coming years. The farm work is done by all the family members.  At times during planting and harvesting, the family works the crops with the help of neighbors.

loans.use: to buy chicken manure and a small bull.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza es una mujer de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de un año, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante y superarse; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabaja desde muy joven para apoyar a sus padres, Maritza no pudo culminar sus estudios primarios, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo ya que sueña en convertirse en una gran Enfermera algún dia, en sus ratos libres le gusta decorar su pequeño hogar para que su familia se sienta feliz y alegre.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo Maritza puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de queques, refrescos y frutas, desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella inicia su labor, dedicando un aproximado de 10 horas, Maritza se siente  a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien ya que sus clientes la recomiendan por sus deliciosos queques caseros y por su buen trato.
Maritza se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de calaminas, palos de madera, clavos y otros materiales, ya que desea poder refacciona el techo de su vivienda, ya que por las intensas lluvias ha sufrido grandes daños;  de esta manera Maritza podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar a su familia, así ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Maritza is a woman of 23 years of age, she lives in the city of Pucallpa with her partner and their one-year old. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, along with her partner, put all their energy into getting ahead and improving their stock in life. 

Sadly, as Maritza had to work from a young age to support her parents, she was unable to finish primary education, but she would have very much liked to have done so, because she dreams of becoming a great nurse some day. In her free time, she likes to decorate her small home so that her family feels happy and content.

On her own initiative and with a lot of hard work and enthusiasm, Maritza opened up her small business selling cakes, drinks and fruits. She starts working in the early hours of the morning and spends on average 10 hours working. Maritza feels at ease performing her job and she feels that it is going well given that her customers recommend her delicious home-made cakes and the good service.

Maritza is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given she will be able to buy corrugated metal sheets, wooden posts, nails and other materials with which she wants to repair the roof of her home given that it suffered severe damage due to heavy rains. In this way, Maritza will be able to offer her family a greater level of safety and well-being, as such she will continue working and striving to get ahead in life.

loans.use: buy corrugated metal sheets, wooden posts and nails, etc.

loans.name: Claudia Lisbeth

texts.es: La señora Claudia es nacido en el mismo pueblo de Tiraque del Departamento de Cochabamba, actualmente vive en su casa heredado por su padre con sus dos hijos menores dedicándose a la venta de abarrotes en su propia casa, es este caso se ve la necesidad de solicitar un capital de inversión para construir su baño en la casa como también capital para la compra de calzados para estas fiestas patrias del presente año. La ubicación de su casa en una calle comercial donde se hace buen negocio más que todo en tiempo de clases, la señora ya tiene experiencia en la venta de la tienda casi no habría muchas dificultades con la actividad a que se dedica principalmente tiene un mercado seguro en el lugar. Por otro lado algunos días le ayuda con la venta su madre cuando va a comprar cosas que falta para su tienda.
texts.en: Señora Claudia is a native of the town of Tiraque, Cochabamba Department.  She currently lives with her two youngest children in the home she inherited from her father.  She makes her living selling groceries from her home.  At this time she needs to request an investment loan to construct a bathroom in her house and also for capital to purchase shoes to sell for this year's National Holiday.  Señora Claudia's home is located on a commercial street.  She does a good business, especially when school is in session.  She has plenty of experience working in her store and doesn't foresee much difficulty with her main business; she has an established market.  Some days her mother helps her with the sales while Señora Claudia goes out to purchase things that she needs for the store.

loans.use: to add a bathroom to her house and to purchase shoes for re-sale.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Paulino, el socio continua dedicandose a la agricultura y ganaderia ,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando ,el socio siembra lo que son papa y maiz para luego venderlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.


El socio solicita el credito para la compra de fertilizantes y abono para su chacra.
El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Paulino is continuing with his work in agriculture and livestock production.  He has spent years in this business, and it is going very well thanks to the effort that he puts into his business every day.  Paulino is a responsible and dedicated person who has a strong desire to continue working.  He is planting potatoes and corn to later sell to the customers who request these products.  He works with his wife, and in this way provides for his family.

Paulino is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and manure for his farm.

Paulino is grateful for this loan, and he promises to comply with the established payment terms.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure for his farm

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transpotte,el tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el realiza la ruta de Cusco e Izcuchaca,el socio ya tiene 8 años que se dedica al negocio de transporte, en sus tiempos libres el socio se dedica a salir con sus hijos a pasear al campo,el sueño del socio es tener un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues to dedicate himself to his transportation business. He has a car which he uses to provide taxi services. He works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m., serving the route to Cusco and Izcuchaca. The borrower has dedicated himself to this transportation business for 8 years already. In his free time, he likes to go out with his children to spend time in the countryside. His dream is to have a new car. He is requesting the loan to buy tires for his car. 

The borrower is happy about the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Cielo

texts.es: Cielo de 52 años, es la propietaria de un restaurante  ubicado en la ciudad de Cartagena, en su propia vivienda donde los elabora, para ser distribuidos a clientes en empresas de la construcción; ella tiene 5 hijos en las edades de 16 a 36 años, con quienes sueñas verlos siempre exitosos. Como mujer cabeza de familia desde hace 12 años inició su restaurante, con él ha logrado generar ingresos para el bienestar de su familia, ha adquirido   casa propia  y aunque ha tenido muchos desafíos, se ha sobrepuesto a ellos y con mucha decisión y trabajo disciplinado, ha salido  adelante con su hogar. Cielo ha recibido 4 financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con los cuales ha logrado fortalecer su microempresa, aumentando su capital de trabajo en el momento justo en el que ella más lo necesitaba. Su meta más adelante es ubicar su negocio en un espacio comercial muy concurrido y lograr con él  posicionamiento en el mercado. En la actualidad su mayor desafío es lograr compras en mayor volumen para obtener descuentos especiales, pues ella hace compras en frecuencias muy cortas y quita mucho de su tiempo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, quinto financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprara materias prima para la elaboración de almuerzos a diferentes clientes de la construcción,  quienes son sus clientes más asiduos y requieren ser atendidos con sus requerimientos de precios, calidad y oportunidad.
texts.en:
Cielo is 52, and is the owner of a restaurant located in the city of Cartagena. She makes the meals in her own home, to be distributed to customers in construction companies. She has five children, ages 16 to 36, and dreams of seeing them always be successful.

As a woman head of her household, she started her restaurant 12 years ago. With it she has managed to generate income for her family's well-being and  has acquired her own house. Even though she has had many challenges, she has overcome them, and with a great deal of decisiveness and disciplined work has kept her household going. 

Cielo has received four loans from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she has managed to build up her small business, increasing her working capital just at the time she needed it most. 

Her goal for the future is to locate her business in a very busy commercial space, in order to achieve better positioning in the market. Currently, her greatest challenge is to manage purchases in greater volume so that she can obtain special discounts, as she makes purchases at frequent intervals and this takes a great deal of her time. 

This is the reason she is applying for a credikiva loan, her fifth with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy ingredients for making lunches for various construction company customers, who are her most regular customers and need to be served in keeping with their needs for price, quality and timeliness.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making lunches.

loans.name: Riovana

texts.es: La señora Riovana es natural de la comunidad de Chaqui Kocha km 75 carretera antigua a Santa Cruz, actualmente vive en la comunidad con sus cuatro hijos a su cargo de ella, la vivienda donde vive es construido de barro con techo de teja tipo rustico. La actividad a que se dedica es la agricultura que se dedica a producir papa, haba y cereales todo estos productos son producidos en los terrenos de herencia de su padre que actualmente vive con su esposo, la  señora Riovana prácticamente el crédito que está solicitando es para comprar los insumos agrícolas para poder incrementar la producción este año así de esa manera de mejorar sus ingresos económicos para mantener su familia. En la zona donde vive la señora Riovana produce estacionalmente, manifiesta que cosecha una ves al año la producción y los trabajos agrícolas realizan con sus hijos en alguna casos con ayuda de sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Riovana is a native of the Chaqui Kocha km 75 community on the old highway to Santa Cruz. She currently lives in the community with her four children who are all reliant on her. The home in which she lives is of a rustic kind, made of mud with a tiled roof.  She makes her living in farming, growing potatoes, beans and cereals, all of these products are grow on land handed down to her by her father who currently lives with her husband. 

The loan which Riovana is seeking is to buy agricultural supplies to increase output this year and in this way, improve the financial income to support her family. The area in which Riovana lives produces seasonally, she says that she harvests the crop once a year and it is her children who carry out the agricultural work, sometimes with the help of her neighbours.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 29 años, se encuentra felizmente casada, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo y sus 2 pequeños hijos a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo estudiar la carrera de Enfermería que tanto deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta compartir gratos momentos con su familia y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para engreírlos.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Ana puso en marca su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana ella inicia su labor, Ana puede dedicar a su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que actualmente su pequeño hogar está construido de esteras, cartones y su techo es de plástico; de esta manera Ana podrá realiza la construcción de su vivienda con materiales adecuados y resistentes, así ella espera poder brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is a 29-year-old woman who is happily married and lives in the city of Ica with her spouse and their 2 small children whom she loves dearly. They are her principal reason for living. Ana is a very good, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, together with her husband, dedicates all her efforts to advancing her family. Lamentably, due to her need to work and cover their costs, she was unable to study for the nursing career that she really desired -- Ana would have liked so much to be able to do that. In her free time, Ana likes to share memorable moments with her family and on occasions, to cook a tasty Carapulcra con Sopa Seca [Meat and Potato Stew with Dry Soup] just to spoil them.

With great effort and enthusiasm, Ana began a small store selling groceries. She begins work every day from early hours of the morning, dedicating approximately 12 hours a day to her business. Ana believes that it is going well, due to her dedication and the good treatment she extends to her customers.

Ana is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help, she will make improvements on her home. At present, her small house is constructed of mats and cardboard, and the roof is plastic sheets. Now, Ana will be able to construct a house of adequate resistant materials. Thus, she hopes to offer her family more security and well-being.

loans.use: to make improvements on her insecure home, for the family's safety.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José es un joven de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, a pesar de ser tan joven él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Derecho que tanto desea, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, día a día José trabaja como Mozo en un restaurante de su ciudad, todas las mañanas desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realiza la compra de vestuarios de danzas típicas de su ciudad; de esta manera José podrá alquilar dichas vestimentas para así poder obtener mayores ingresos, los cuales poco a poco irá ahorrando par en un futuro no muy lejano poder iniciar su propio negocio de venta y alquiler de vestuarios, así el luchará por conseguir sus sueño de convertirse en un gran abogado y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
José is a 20-year-old young man, who is single and living in the city of Nazca with his parents and siblings.  Despite being so young, he is very kind, hardworking and enthusiastic, with a great desire to excel.  Thanks to the efforts and support of his parents, he is studying for a law degree that he wishes for.  In his spare time he likes to relax listening to some music and sometimes cooking a delicious chicken and rice dish to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and enthusiasm, José works everyday as a waiter in a restaurant in his city.  Every morning, he begins his work in the early hours.  He can work approximately 8 hours and believes in doing well by his good performance and by providing friendly service to others.

Jose is very grateful to Kiva borrowers, and thanks to the help he can purchase dance costumes that are traditional to his city.  This way, he can rent these garments to earn more income.  With gradual saving, in the not too distant future he will be able to start his own business selling and renting costumes.  He will struggle to achieve his dream of becoming a great lawyer and having his own house.

loans.use: to buy traditional dance costumes.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is 27 years old, married with four children. To earn a living, she offers computer services and also sells stationery. She operates her business in a competitive environment with reliable customers. She has been in the business for one year. Being a new member of Faulu Kenya, she hopes to expand her business in the future. She needs a loan of 20,000 KES to buy machines and stationary.

loans.use: to buy machines and stationery.

loans.name: Mzisadar

texts.en:
Mzisadar is 66 years old and lives in a small village of Lanchkhuti district. She is a widow and lives with her daughter and her 97-year-old mother. The state provides Mzisadar and her mother with a retirement pension. Mzisadar and her daughter run the agricultural business. The family owns a large agricultural land, where citrus and maize are grown. Besides her agricultural business, Mzisadar operates a dairy farming as well. She has 5 milking cows and 5 calves. Mzisadar and her daughter milk cows every day and produce cheese. They sell their products at the local open market. In addition, Mzisadar has a greenhouse and grows variety of vegetables there. She is a very hardworking, responsible person with a lot of experience in her work.

Mzisadar requested a loan to expand her greenhouse business and to build a cattle-shed. She plans to expand the dairy farm, but the existing conditions don’t allow her to implement this plan. With this loan, she will be able to double her vegetable and dairy production and increase the income of the family. With great trust in her work, Mzisadar hopes to have an abundant harvest that she can sell, earning income to cover household necessities so that she can realize her dream of giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to expand her greenhouse business and build a cattle-shed.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 30 years old and married with two children who are in school. She operates a mobile money transfer (M-pesa) shop to earn a living. She operates her business in a busy environment with reliable customers. She has engaged herself in this business for two years. 

She testifies that through Faulu Kenya she has become financially knowledgeable because she has been trained in financial management. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. She has requested a loan of 10,000 KES to add float money for the business.

loans.use: to add float money.

loans.name: Las Brujitas Group

texts.es:
Este banco comunal “Las Brujitas” está conformado por 15 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de ropa usada, taller de costuras, boutique, venta de telas, venta de tortas, bazar, venta de perfumes, venta de cuchuflis,  mantención de maquinas de dulces de colegios, venta de joyas de acero quirúrgico, kiosko surtido, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Osorno.
Teresa, presidenta del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie en primera fila, ocupando el quinto lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste una blusa con rosas de color roja y encima lleva puesto una chaqueta de color negro y pantalones del mismo color, su cabello es de color castaño oscuro y lo usa suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de ropa usada, se desempeña en este rubro desde hace 3 años. Comenta que trabaja de lunes a domingo en conjunto con una amiga donde Teresa ocupa una parte del local para sus ventas, su horario de trabajo lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
La mercadería que va necesitando la compra en la ciudad de Santiago y en la ciudad de Osorno en distribuidoras y bodegas a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará ropa de todos los modelos y tallas.
Las metas de Teresa son poder independizarse con su negocio para trabajar más tranquila y generar mayores ingresos y optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Teresa vive junto a su hijo de 14 años quien se encuentra estudiando. Sus sueños a nivel familiar, personal y laboral son tener las cosas básicas de la vida, salud, trabajo y que no le falte para los estudios de su hijo y que a la vez su hijo se sienta bien.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, intereses, lo cual también le ha servido como un momento de distracción. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones, ha aprendido administrar su negocio de mejor manera.
Osorno es una ciudad que se ubica en la zona sur de Chile, región de Los Lagos. Es un importante centro agropecuario que se identifica como "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" de Chile. Dentro de su actividad agropecuaria se destaca el cultivo de trigo y avena, la crianza de ganado, para el procesamiento de carnes y lácteos además de la fabricación de equipos agrarios.
Destaca en Osorno el único estadio de fútbol techado de Chile, el Estadio Municipal "Rubén Marcos”.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Brujitas" consists of 15 entrepreneurs who are engaged to different lines of work, among which are selling used clothes, sewing workshops, boutiques, selling fabrics, selling cakes, bazaar, selling perfumes, selling cuchuflis [a snack made with caramel], maintaining candy machines in schools, selling surgical steel jewelry, varied kiosks, and other services. All the members live in the city of Osorno.

Teresa is the President of the Communal Bank's group. In the picture, she is standing in the front row, being the fifth person from right to left. She is wearing a red blouse with rouses, and on top of it she is wearing a black jacket and pants of the same color. Her hair is dark brown and wears it loose.   

She is engaged in selling used clothes. She has been in the business for three years. She says that works Monday to Sunday with a friend. Teresa occupies part of the premises for her sales, and she distributes her schedule depending on her availability. She buys the merchandise she needs in Santiago and in Osorno in distribution centers and low cost warehouses, thus it's convenient economically.

With the loan she will buy clothes of all models and sizes. Teresa's goals are to become independent with her business so she can work more calm and generate more income to achieve a higher quality of life. Teresa lives with her son, who is 14 years old and who is studying. Her dreams at a family, personal and professional level are to have the basic things of life such as health and work. Also, she wants to have enough for the studies of her son and that her son feels good. 

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza gave her to invest in her business. Also, she feels very comfortable with the other entrepreneurs of the Communal Bank group, because they share varied activities and interests, time that is also used for a moment of entertainment. Regarding the training given at group meetings, she learned how to manage her business better.

Osorno is a city located in the southern region of Chile, in Los Lagos region. It is an important agricultural center that is called as "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" [The Homeland of Milk and Meat]. Among its agricultural activities, the most important are wheat and oats, cattle breeding for the meat and milk, in addition to manufacturing of agricultural equipment. Osorno is known for the only football stadium in Chile covered with a roof, the Municipal Stadium "Rubén Marcos".

loans.use: to buy clothes of all styles and sizes.

loans.name: Domitila

texts.en: Domtila has been selling herbal medicines to earn a living. She had previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya that helped her to buy herbal medicines to sell. This helped her to grow her business and with the income she generated, she was able to open a beauty salon. She is now applying for a 20,000 KES loan to buy a hair dryer and hair oil.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and hair oil.

loans.name: Everaldo Rene

texts.es:
Everaldo es un hombre de 31 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo por salir adelante; gracias a su esfuerzo pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Computación e Informática, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando un poco de música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un delicioso Pollo al Horno para compartir gratos momentos con sus padres y hermanos.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Everaldo puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de bebida, tales como gaseosas, agua mineral, cervezas y adicionalmente vende golosinas, él dedica su negocio un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por a buena atención que brinda a  sus clientes.
Everaldo se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como gaseosas y cervezas; de esta manera Everaldo tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e ingresos económicos, los cuales poco a poco le ayudarán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio, así él seguirá esforzándose y trabajando para seguir apoyando a su familia y juntos salir adelante.
texts.en:
Everaldo is a single, 31-year-old man living in the city of Nazca.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who very much wants to get ahead.  Thanks to his efforts he was able to study computer programming and in his free time likes to relax listening to music and sometimes cooks a delicious “Pollo al Horno” to share pleasant moments with his parents and siblings.

On his own initiative and with much effort and enthusiasm, Everlado started his own business selling soft-drinks, mineral water, and beer and also sells snacks.  He spends about 12 hours daily at work and believes that he does well because of the good service he provides his customers.

Everaldo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy merchandise like soft-drinks and beer so that his business will be better stocked and he will be able with this to increase sales and income which will help him to gradually expand the business so he can continue striving and working to continue supporting his family so that they can all get ahead together.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Benedicta Albertina

texts.es: Benedicta es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante para ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Desde muy temprana edad aprendió el comercio porque sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar, está muy agradecida con ellos ya que esta es su forma de ganarse la vida para ayudar a su familia. Su tienda la abre desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las ocho de la noche cierra temprano porque el sector es muy peligroso por lo que prefiere no ser blanco de la delincuencia. Su esposo es comerciante trabaja vendiendo varios productos recorriendo en su sector, sus dos hijos son menores de edad y estudian en la escuela fiscal. Con el crédito que está solicitando ella va a comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, lácteos, fideos etc., para tener en percha y ofrecer más variedad. A futuro le gustaría poder construir su casa de cemento ya que es de caña y poder brindarle un futuro seguro a sus hijos ya que el sector donde vive es peligroso.
texts.en:
Benedicta is a woman who very much wants to get ahead in order to offer her children a better quality of life.  From a very early age she learned commerce because her parents taught her how to work and she is very grateful to them because it’s her way of earning a livelihood to help her family.  

She opens her store at 6 in the morning and goes until 8 at night; she closes early because the area she lives in is very dangerous and she would prefer not to be a target for crime.  Her husband is a merchant who works selling various products from place to place and her two children are minors attending public school.  

She will use the loan she’s requesting to buy products like rice, sugar, dairy products, noodles, etc. to have on the shelves and offer more variety.  In the future she’d like to build a cement house because hers is made of sugarcane stalks to provide her children with a safer future because the sector they live in is very dangerous.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en:
Sophia is thirty years old and has one child. For the past five years she has run a print shop to earn a living. She has one employee, and her shop is in a busy neighborhood with reliable customers.

Sophia had previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya that helped her to improve her business. She is now applying for a loan of 100,000 KES to buy a printer and a computer. Her ambition is to open a cyber cafe.

loans.use: to buy a printer and a computer.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is 27 years old and lives in Lanchkhuti district. She lives with her husband, grandmother, aunt and one-year-old daughter. Nana’s aunt works as a librarian in their village and gets a monthly salary. Her grandmother is a pensioner. Nana runs an agricultural business with her husband-Beka. They have an agricultural land, where nuts and variety of fruits are grown. Nana and Beka sell their production at the local open market. In addition, Nana works as a teacher at the local school and gets a monthly income. She is a very hardworking woman with a great desire to get ahead.

Nana requested a loan to purchase livestock and improve the living conditions of the family. With this loan, she will be able to develop her animal husbandry business and get an increased profit.  With the increased profit, she will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business to expand it and make it more profitable. Taking into account the above-mentioned activities, the living conditions of the family will be improved. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene tiene 32 años, es una mujer muy amable, vive en la casa que compró junto a su pareja Heber, allí habitan con sus dos hijos Frans y Jack, a quienes desean brindarles un mejor futuro.
Su tienda de abarrotes es una de las más concurridas de la localidad, ya que es la más grande y donde se encuentran todos los comestibles y otros productos (arroz, azúcar, fideos, conservas, bebidas, productos de limpieza, menestras, etc.).  La amabilidad  que posee en su trato ha hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en hacer sus compras desde muy temprano, ya que saben que es la primera tienda en abrirse. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que la gente se sienta bien al llevar sus productos, lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que viajar a una hora de su pueblo para comprar más mercadería para su negocio. Para más adelante, espera que su negocio sea aun más atractivo y vender también materiales de escritorio. 

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP y una vez más se siente contenta por el apoyo financiero que le dan para continuar con su negocio. Asimismo, agradece a las socias de su banco comunal porque son mujeres que saben salir adelante y aprende de su ejemplo.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles que ahora solicita, podrá incrementar los productos de su tienda, como: arroz, azúcar, conservas, fideos, leche, entre otros.
texts.en:
Marlene is 32 years old and a kind woman.  She lives in a house that she bought together with her partner Heber.  They live there with their two children Frans and Jack, who they want to give a better future.

Her grocery store is one of the most popular in the area since it is the largest and the place where you can find all your groceries and other products (rice, sugar, noodles, preserves, beverages, cleaning products, stews, etc.)  The friendliness that she possesses is the trait that has made her business the preferred by her neighbors, who don't hesitate to shop starting very early, since they know that it is the first store to open.  What she enjoys most about her job is that the people feel good about buying their products.  She has worked 4 years in this capacity and considers the most difficult part to be traveling an hour from her town to purchase more merchandise for her business.  For the future, she hopes that her business will be still more attractive and will also sell office supplies.

This is her third loan with MFP and once again she feels happy for the financial support that they have given her to continue with her business.  Likewise, she is grateful for the members of her community bank because they are women who know how to get ahead and she learns from their example. 

With the 3,000 nuevos soles (Peruvian currency), she will be able to increase the products in her store, like: rice, sugar, preserves, noodles, milk, and others).

loans.use: to increase the products in her store, purchasing rice, sugar, preserves, noodles, milk, and other items.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial tiene 49 años, está casado con Olga, con quien tiene seis hijos. Viven en la casa que heredó su esposa de sus padres hace 10 años.
Se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería. Siembra en sus propios terrenos, papa y alfalfa, “siembro alfalfa porque en mi localidad muchos tiene ganado, a quienes puedo vender para el alimento de los animales”, comenta. Ya tiene 12 años de experiencia y vende sus productos a los comerciantes de la ciudad. También tiene animales, toros de buena raza que vende en las ferias de su localidad. Ahora espera sembrar alfalfa en mayor cantidad, ya que en la época de verano tiene más demanda y puede obtener mayores ganancias. 

Él ha ingresado al grupo “Estrellitas” y este es su primer crédito con MFP. Está seguro que con el apoyo económico podrá mejorar su producción. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, ya que es una persona responsable. Marcial invertirá el dinero de este préstamo en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de alfalfa y fertilizantes naturales para sus siembras.
texts.en:
Marcial is 49 years old, he is married with Olga and they have six children. They live in the house his wife inherited from her parents 10 years ago.
He is a farmer and an animal breeder. He grows potatoes and alfalfa in his own lands, and he says: “I plant alfalfa because there are many animal breeders where I live, and I can sell them food for their animals”. He has already 12 years of experience and he sells his products to retailers of his town. He also breeds animals, a good breed of bulls he sells during the fairs of his community. He now hopes to plant a bigger quantity of alfalfa, as in the summer he receives more requests and can therefore earn more money.

He has entered the “Estrellitas” (Little Stars) Group and this is his first loan with MFP. He is sure that thanks to this economic support he will improve his production. He also commits to being punctual with the repayment of his dues, as he is a responsible person.
Marcial will invest the loan he is requesting in the purchase one bag of alfalfa seeds and in manure for his crops.

loans.use: To buy one bag of alfalfa seeds and manure for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a Notebook.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES EN ACCION”;  La socia es Ana María ,la socia tiene 39 años de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la ganadería y venta de queso ,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le, pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia vende los quesos a sus clientes de forma ambulatoria ,la socia también viaja parta vender los quesos al distrito de Huancarani,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 


La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de alimentos para sus vacas como forraje.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: Ana María is a member of the “Mujeres en Acción” (Women in Action) communal bank.  She’s 39-years-old and alternates her daily chores with raising cattle and selling cheese.  She’s been in this business for years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She sells the cheese to customers from place to place in Huancarani District.  She’s a responsible, dedicated person who supports her family this way.  She’s asking for a loan to buy feed, like forage for her cows.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes sells natural medicine, herbal products and fabric to earn a living. She previously acquired a loan from Faulu Kenya that helped her to buy natural medicine and herbal products to sell. This helped her to improve her business.

With the extra income, Agnes was able to start selling fabrics as well. She is now requesting a 40,000 KES loan to buy more fabric to stock her shop. She dreams of opening other outlets in the future.

loans.use: to buy more fabric to stock her shop.

loans.name: Julio

texts.en: Julio is 44 years old, married and has four children. His eldest is 18 and the youngest is 9. Julio is into the hog-raising business to help augment the income of his family. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy feed and piglets so he can maximize his income in hog raising. This is something that he enjoys doing and with proper care, he can be assured of healthy hogs that he can sell in four months time. In the future, he would like to expand his hog-raising business so that he can pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets

loans.name: María Eduwiges

texts.es:
La señora María solicita un crédito para poder hacer crecer su negocio de abarrotes por  lo cual necesita invertir en mas mercancía para que su tiendita valla creciendo poco a poco y tener a la venta lo que sus clientes necesitan.
Doña María Eduwiges es una persona muy emprendedora anteriormente trabaja en casa para una señora donde ayudaba con las labores del hogar y ahorrando y con mucho esfuerzo abrió su pequeño negocio y así se convirtió en vendedora y pudo dejar de ser empleada para ser dueña de algo propio, y poco a poco le a surtido de productos  al negocio y cuando no es rentable el abarrotes se dedica a vender raspas en un parque que esta cerca de su vivienda, su esposo también trabaja  como vendedor para otra compañía de abarrotes por mayoreo y con los sueldos de ambos logran sacar a delante los gastos familiares.
El principal cambio será que el negocio de abarrotes generara más ingresos con los cuales desean hacerle pequeñas mejoras a su vivienda y también poder tener más margen de ganancia.
texts.en:
Maria is requesting a loan so that she can expand her grocery store business.  To do this she needs to invest in more merchandise.  This way her store will be gradually growing, and she will have the products on hand that her customers need.

Maria Eduwiges is a very enterprising person.  She used to work in a personal residence where she helped out with the household chores.  She saved her money, and with a lot of effort she opened her small business and thus became a merchant.  This way she could leave her job and become her own boss.  She has been stocking up her store gradually with products, and when the grocery store is not profitable she goes out to sell shaved ice in a park that is close to her house.  Her husband also works as a salesman for a wholesale grocery firm, and with both of their earnings they have managed to cover the household expenditures. 

The main result will be that her grocery store will generate more income, with which she wants to make some small improvements to her house.  Also, she will be able to have a better profit margin.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is 33 years old. He is married to Grace and they have two children who are seven and three years old.

He has a general store where he has been selling a variety of items at retail prices for three years and currently earns a monthly income of KES 30,000. The loan will be used to purchase more stock of clothes, shoes, plastics jugs, basins and electronic gadgets.The anticipated profits will be used to buy fixed assets such as land.
